About

Important news will be placed here in the future

The algorithmic trading club is a club dedicated to teaching students of UW the core of quantitative finance, including topics that range from programming, statistics, and finance. Follow us at our social media

Learn Quant skills

Gain skills in Python and its computing packages, QuantConnect, and more.
